ValidationRule.description: Ensure a Holiday Allowance record is specified
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(amc__Holiday_Allowance__c), NOT( ISBLANK(amc__Role__c) ), OR( ISPICKVAL(amc__Type__c, "Annual Leave"), ISPICKVAL(amc__Type__c, "Sick Leave"), ISPICKVAL(amc__Type__c, "Study Leave") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select a Holiday Allowance for this Holiday
